ACTIONS.parked_angle: The motorcycle is parked upright, slightly angled toward the camera to highlight its design and metallic details.
ACTIONS.riding_confident: Riding confidently with a relaxed posture, slight lean forward, wheels in motion.
ACTIONS.closeup_static: Parked for a three-quarter view close-up focusing on the tank, headlight, and front suspension.
ACTIONS.offroad_action: The motorcycle is navigating rugged terrain, with dust or mud thrown from the tires, suspension visibly compressed, and the rider in a dynamic posture as if tackling an obstacle or incline.

RIDERS.default: May include a Mexican rider wearing an open-face helmet, black leather jacket, and a pastel blue T-shirt
RIDERS.offroad: May include a Mexican rider wearing an adventure or motocross helmet with a visor, protective off-road jacket with armored pads, sturdy riding boots, and gloves, all in earthy or bright colors suitable for rugged terrain

LIGHTING.day_warm: Warm daylight illumination, soft shadows, and natural reflections on the metallic tank.
LIGHTING.golden_hour: Golden hour lighting with long soft shadows and warm highlights emphasizing contours.
LIGHTING.night_cinematic: Cinematic night lighting, reflections on wet asphalt, soft contrast and controlled highlights.
LIGHTING.overcast_soft: Soft overcast daylight, diffused shadows, balanced contrast and even surface reflections.

STYLE_EXTRAS.bokeh: Background slightly blurred (soft bokeh) to emphasize the motorcycle in the foreground.
STYLE_EXTRAS.motion_blur: Subtle motion blur on the background and wheels to convey speed and movement.
STYLE_EXTRAS.advertising: Advertising editorial style, cinematic composition, vivid colors, and detailed textures of the environment.

COMPOSITION.full_shot: Full shot showing the entire motorcycle with adequate background space, motorcycle occupies about 60-70% of the frame
COMPOSITION.medium_shot: Medium shot with motorcycle in center, occupying about 50-60% of the frame, good background context
COMPOSITION.close_up: Close-up shot focusing on motorcycle details, motorcycle occupies 80-90% of the frame
COMPOSITION.environmental: Environmental shot where motorcycle is prominent but not dominating, motorcycle occupies about 40-50% of the frame with rich background context
COMPOSITION.balanced: Balanced composition with motorcycle as main subject, occupying about 50-60% of the frame, professional photography composition

CAMERA_DISTANCE.wide: Wide angle shot showing full motorcycle with surrounding environment
CAMERA_DISTANCE.medium: Medium distance shot with good balance between motorcycle and background
CAMERA_DISTANCE.close: Close distance shot emphasizing motorcycle details

background_variety: with natural elements in the background
with urban elements in the background
